title: Patch Notes and Maintenance Notice (No downtime required)
text:
# Patch Notes and Maintenance Notice (No downtime required)

Dear Wanderers, @Game Updates 
Eastwind Pavilion will perform rolling maintenance from <ts> to <tS>. During this period, you will still be able to log in and play, but some features and modes may be temporarily unavailable. 

ðŸ“œPatch Notes: https://www.wherewindsmeetgame.com/news/official/SpringsBliss.html

The update window may change depending on circumstances, so please plan your gaming accordingly. Thank you for your understanding and support!

Where Winds Meet | Official Website

Where Winds Meet is an epic open-world action-adventure RPG rooted in the rich legacy of Wuxia. Set during the turbulent era of tenth-century China, you take on the role of a young sword master, uncovering forgotten truths and the mysteries of your own identity. As the wind stirs across mountains and rivers, so too will your legend rise.

https://www.wherewindsmeetgame.com/news/official/SpringsBliss.html
author: armoredsoldiers

Version 1.3, Springâ€™s Bliss, goes live right after the zero-downtime maintenance (<ts> to <tS>)

A new season dawns and new rewards await. @Game Updates 
Log in to claim exclusive appearances, 20x Lingering Melody, 10x Resonating Melody, and plenty of other exciting rewards!

title: # Version 1.3 Spring's Bliss Pre-Downloa
text:
# Version 1.3 Spring's Bliss Pre-Download

Dear Wanderers, <@&1466002215406801037> <@&1398909900889002036> 
Version 1.3 pre-download is available. Follow the instructions and pre-download now to jump in faster after the update.

**Pre-download Time**
> 2026/1/31 21:00 â€“ 2026/2/5 20:59 (UTC)

**Pre-download File Size:**
> â— PC : 900MB
> â— Mobile (Android & iOS): 400 MB.
* Due to the large file size, please check your device storage and ensure a stable Wiâ€‘Fi connection prior to download.   

**Instructions:**
> â— PC Launcher
> Step 1: Open the Where Winds Meet launcher
> Step 2: Click the "Pre-download" icon to the left of Start Game.
Note: 
- You can continue playing on PC while pre-downloading.
- **Pre-download isnâ€™t available on Steam, Epic, or PlayStation for now**.

> â— Mobile (Android & iOS)
> Step 1: Open Where Winds Meet
> Step 2: Tap the "Pre-download" icon at the bottom-left of the login screen, or the top-right icon after entering.
Note: You can continue playing on mobile while pre-downloading.
author: armoredsoldiers
